Directives: type-ahead-field

type-ahead-field

type-ahead-field(attribute, autofocus, debounce, disable, filter, help, label, labelAttribute, options, placeholder, valueAttribute)

Displays a HTML element with type-ahead functionality. This component requires the Angular Bootstrap library as a dependency. This directive can be configured to optionally display an informational tooltip. In the event of a validation error, this directive will also render an inline error message.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
attribute String

Name of the attribute within the parent form-for directive's model object. This attributes specifies the data-binding target for the input. Dot notation (ex "address.street") is supported.
autofocus attribute

The presence of this attribute will auto-focus the input field.
debounce int

Debounce duration (in ms) before input text is applied to model and evaluated. To disable debounce (update only on blur) specify a value of false. This value's default is determined by FormForConfiguration.
disable Boolean

Disable input element. (Note the name is disable and not disabled to avoid collisions with the HTML5 disabled attribute).
filter String

Two-way bindable filter string. $watch this property to load remote options based on filter text. (Refer to this Plunker demo for an example.)
help String

Optional help tooltip to display on hover. By default this makes use of the Angular Bootstrap tooltip directive and the Font Awesome icon set.
label String

Optional field label displayed before the input. (Although not required, it is strongly suggested that you specify a value for this attribute.) HTML is allowed for this attribute.
labelAttribute String

Optional override for label key in options array. Defaults to "label".
options Array

Set of options, each containing a label and value key. The label is displayed to the user and the value is assigned to the corresponding model attribute on selection.
placeholder String

Optional placeholder text to display if input is empty.
valueAttribute String

Optional override for value key in options array. Defaults to "value".
Source:
  • directives/type-ahead-field.js, line 1
Example
// To render a type-ahead field that filters data specified via options:
<type-ahead-field label="State"
                  attribute="state"
                  options="states"
                  placeholder="Choose a state">
</type-ahead-field>

// To reload remote data based on filter text, bind to the filter attribute as follows:
<type-ahead-field label="State"
                  attribute="state"
                  options="states"
                  placeholder="Choose a state"
                  filter="filterText">
</type-ahead-field>

$scope.$watch('filterText', function(value) {
  // Load remote data and update $scope.states collection
});
